item.description:
It’s good to be on top! Rooftop 120 is bringing a unique and trendy atmosphere to Hartford County. Featuring a magnificent year round outdoor patio with stunning views. Rooftop120 offers a wide variety of cocktails, wine and specialty drinks. The menu includes Tapas where people can order plates to share as they enjoy their cocktails, sit around the fire pit or just enjoy the atmosphere. Take a look at their menus...

www.rooftop120.com/

Let's check it out and see what the buzz is about! Come join us for a night of friends and laughter!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: ROOFTOP 120...Four Season Rooftop Tapas!
